review: Bought this mainly to mirror iPad and Macbook video to the TV.  Works fine with iPad but if I use it to mirror or extend video from the desktop of my Macbook Air, the video is very choppy and jittery.  Tried every fix I could find online and no luck.  Apple knows about it but hasn't fixed it.  With that problem, the Apple TV is basically just a Roku with no Amazon Prime.  Well, not quite...Roku has Plex, which works.
